data.title: de.NBI
data.text:
Events

The following events are scheduled for 2024:

5. - 6. Nov, 2024 (2p-6p CET / UTC +1): 2-day Virtual Workshop (1): CellNetAnalyzer / CNApy more information | registration

19. - 20. Nov, 2024 (9a-12p CET / UTC +1): 2-day Virtual Workshop (2): COPASI more information | registration

25. - 26. Nov, 2024 (2p-6p CET / UTC +1): 2-day Virtual Workshop (3): SABIO-RK / SEEK more information | registration

The following events are scheduled for 2023:

28. - 30. Nov, 2023: 3-day virtual workshop (with CellNetAnalyzer, COPASI and SABIO RK hands-on exercises) more information | registration

The following events are scheduled for 2022:

9. - 11. Aug, 2022: 3-day virtual workshop (with COPASI, CellNetAnalyzer and SABIO RK hands-on exercises) more information | registration

The following events are scheduled for 2021:

20. - 22. Apr, 2021: 3-day virtual workshop (with CellNetAnalyzer, COPASI and SABIO RK hands-on exercises) more information | registration

The following events are scheduled for 2020:

21. - 23. Sep, 2020: 3-day virtual workshop (with CellNetAnalyzer, COPASI and SABIO RK hands-on exercises) more information | registration

CANCELLED 27. - 29. April, 2020: 3-day workshop in Magdeburg (with CellNetAnalyzer, COPASI and SABIO RK hands-on exercises) more information

The following events are scheduled for 2019:

31. Oct, 2019: Advanced modeling with COPASI more information | registration

15. Okt, 2019: Analyzing and redesigning metabolic networks with CellNetAnalyzer - FOSBE more information

12. Aug, 2019: Analyzing metabolic networks with CellNetAnalyzer - MPA more information

18. - 20. Mar, 2019: 3-day workshop in Heidelberg (with CellNetAnalyzer, COPASI and SABIO RK hands-on exercises) more information | registration

The following events are scheduled for 2018:

27. Oct, 2018: Advanced modeling with COPASI more information | registration

27. Oct, 2018: COMBINE & de.NBI Tutorial: Modelling and Simulation Tools in Systems Biology more information

24. - 26. Apr, 2018: 3-day workshop in Magdeburg (with CellNetAnalyzer, COPASI and SABIO RK hands-on exercises) more information | registration

The following events are scheduled for 2017:

12. / 13. September, 2017: 2-days workshop (with COPASI and CellNetAnalyzer hands-on exercises) more information

August 6, 2017:joint COMBINE Tutorial ICSB 2017 (Blacksburg, VA) more information

August 7, 2017:Advanced COPASI Tutorial at ICSB 2017 (Blacksburg, VA)

Usage of COPASI - global view

Note: only approx. 30% of the publications, having used COPASI have been included so far. For more information see the live page .
